Posts.Title: Had mastectomy last

Posts.Content: I am getting a masectomy this week. I am 45 and have an auto immune disorder to make things more tricky. I can't have radiation so the masectomy was my only option. I can't have reconstruction as I am too heavy. I am terrified of losing my right breast. Will I be ok.
Posts.Title: Getting masectomy this week.
